title: Normals, calling out the roles.
body: Well, i recently have been trying to call out my role and I quickly write "mid" , and it sometimes doesnt pop up on my screen. It says i have been blocked from chat and then other ppl get to have my role. I get really frustrated as I dont understad why this happens, I DONT SPAM, I am "rarely" toxic...actually i take that back and It just seems to frustrate me, I am now decidin to just do RANKED forever XD, bronze lyfe{{champion:157}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3072}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
It's going to be so nice when we're finally able to get Draft Pick Normals. My personal pet peeve is being unable to practice counter picks and champion select strategy in normals :(

Soonâ„¢
I'd be keen for them to shut down normals blind pick and force team builder/ ranked type system. I don't play normas for that reason now.
